#include <iostream>
#define max 10010
int in[max], out[max];
int main () {
	int n, m, u, v, t=0, i;
	bool flag = true, root=false;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
	while ( t<m ){
		scanf("%d%d",&u,&v);
		out[u]++;
		in [v]++;
		if(out[u] > 2 || in[v] > 1) flag=false;
		t++;
	}
	if(flag){
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
		if(in[i]==0 && !root ){root=true;}
		else if ( in[i] == 0 && root ) {flag=false;break;}
	  }
	 }
	if(flag) printf("YES\n");
	else     printf("NO\n");
}
